mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APRV_LINE A, ( SELECT DOC_STATUS, DOC_NO FROM TB_APRV_INFO WHERE (#{searchType} = 0 AND DOC_STATUS = '02') OR (#{searchType} = 1 AND DOC_STATUS IN ('03', '04')) )B WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO

SELECT F.DOC_NO, F.COM_NAME, F.TITLE, F.USER_NAME, F.REG_DT, F.DEPT_NAME, F.DOC_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.DOC_NO, D.COM_NAME, A.TITLE, B.USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, C.DEPT_NAME, A.DOC_STATUS FROM TB_APRV_INFO A JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DEPT_CD FROM TB_USER_INFO ) B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID JOIN ( SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NAME FROM TB_DEPT_INFO ) C ON B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD JOIN ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD, COM_CD, COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE ) D ON A.DOC_TYPE = D.COM_CD AND D.COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID, DOC_NO FROM TB_APRV_LINE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) E ON A.DOC_NO = E.DOC_NO WHERE (#{searchType} = 0 AND A.DOC_STATUS = '02') OR (#{searchType} = 1 AND A.DOC_STATUS IN ('03', '04')) )F WHERE RN > (#{currentPage}-1)*#{countPerPage} AND RN <= #{currentPage}*#{countPerPage}

SELECT E.DOC_NO, E.COM_NAME, E.TITLE, E.USER_NAME, E.REG_DT, E.DEPT_NAME, E.DOC_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.DOC_NO, D.COM_NAME, A.TITLE, B.USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, C.DEPT_NAME, A.DOC_STATUS FROM TB_APRV_INFO A, ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DEPT_CD FROM TB_USER_INFO )B, ( SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NAME FROM TB_DEPT_INFO )C, ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD, COM_CD, COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE )D WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND A.DOC_TYPE = D.COM_CD AND D.COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' )E WHERE RN > (#{currentPage}-1)*#{countPerPage} AND RN <= #{currentPage}*#{countPerPage}

SELECT A.DOC_NO, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, C.USER_NAME, B.DEPT_NAME, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' AND DOC_TYPE = COM_CD) DOC_TYPE, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP03' AND DOC_CLASS = COM_CD) DOC_CLASS, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP04' AND DOC_STATUS = COM_CD) DOC_STATUS, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP02' AND PRESERVE_YEAR = COM_CD) PRESERVE_YEAR FROM TB_APRV_INFO A, ( SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NAME FROM TB_DEPT_INFO )B, ( SELECT USER_ID, DEPT_CD, USER_NAME FROM TB_USER_INFO )C WHERE A.DOC_NO = #{docNo} AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD

SELECT C.USER_NAME, B.DEPT_NAME, A.USER_ID, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP05' AND APRV_TYPE = COM_CD) DOC_TYPE, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP06' AND APRV_STATUS = COM_CD) DOC_STATUS, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'US01' AND C.POSITION_CD = COM_CD) POSITION_CD FROM TB_APRV_LINE A, ( SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NAME FROM TB_DEPT_INFO )B, ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DEPT_CD, POSITION_CD FROM TB_USER_INFO )C WHERE A.DOC_NO = #{docNo} AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM') || LPAD(NVL(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(doc_no), 5)), 0) + 1, 3, '0') FROM TB_APRV_INFO WHERE DOC_NO LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM')||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_APRV_INFO (DOC_NO, USER_ID, DOC_TYPE, PRESERVE_YEAR, DOC_CLASS, DOC_STATUS, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID) VALUES( #{docNo}, #{userId}, #{docType}, #{preserveYear}, #{docClass}, #{docStatus}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO TB_APRV_LINE (DOC_NO, APRV_SEQ, USER_ID, APRV_TYPE, APRV_STATUS, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID) VALUES (#{docNo}, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(APRV_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TB_APRV_LINE WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo} ), #{userId}, #{aprvType}, #{aprvStatus}, SYSDATE, #{regUserId})

INSERT INTO TB_APRV_FILE (DOC_NO, FILE_SEQ, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID, FILE_SIZE) VALUES (#{docNo}, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TB_APRV_FILE WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo} ), #{filePath}, #{fileName}, SYSDATE, #{regUserId}, #{fileSize})
